abstract: New York region grapples with surprise mix of ice and rain that clogs traffic and inundates emergency rooms with fall-related injuries; forecasters and emergency service workers alike are caught off guard by spate of treacherous weather.
lead_paragraph: Forecasters and emergency services alike seemed to have been caught off-guard by the icy surprise in the New York region.

byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro, Corey Kilgannon and Daniel E. Slotnick contributed reporting.

snippet: Forecasters and emergency services alike seemed to have been caught off-guard by the icy surprise in the New York region.

headline.main: Icy Rain Tests the New York Region’s Unwary
headline.print_headline: Icy Rain Tests the Region’s Unwary
